links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a={};Do[x=14*n-1;If[PrimeQ[x],AppendTo[a,x]],{n,10^2}];a - _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Apr 29 2008Select[Prime[Range[250]], MemberQ[{6}, Mod[#, 7]] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 13 2012 *)Select[Range[6,1600,7],PrimeQ] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Aug 17 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(11000) | p mod 7 eq 6 ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 13 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
